summary: An email forwarding witness interview notes regarding the Epstein case. The notes summarize an interview with a cooperative witness who recalls recruiting and bringing girls to Epstein for payment, and having limited interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case; the witness recalls Epstein paying him $200 for the girls he brought.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell; the witness recalls his interactions with her were very limited and doesn't think they discussed bringing girls.

connections.description: Both are central figures in the case; the witness's statement places them in the same context of alleged recruitment activities.
The witness states Epstein paid him $200 for the girls he brought to him.
The witness recalls his interactions with Maxwell were very limited.

events.title: Witness Interview
events.description: An interview was conducted with a witness who is cooperative and willing to speak again. The witness recalls recruiting and bringing girls to Epstein for payment.

keyFacts: A witness was interviewed and was cooperative, willing to speak again if needed.
The witness recalls recruiting and/or bringing girls to Epstein.
Epstein would pay the witness $200 for the girls he brought.
The witness's interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell were very limited, and he didn't think they discussed bringing girls.
The witness recalls recruiting and giving a 'pre-massage speech' about how the process worked.
